body.p: The bash-completion eclass provides functions for installing contributed bash-completion scripts. See for how to write completion scripts.

tr.ti: Install a bash completion file if and only if the user has USE="bash-completion". If BASH_COMPLETION_NAME is set, this will be used for deciding the application name. Otherwise, the second argument will be used (if present), or failing that, ${PN}.
If the user has USE="bash-completion", displays a message explaining how to activate the completion for this package.
